name: Muhammad Faruq Kamal - Electronics Engineering Student & Tech Enthusiast
description: A dedicated and continuously growing Electronics Engineering student with a strong passion for technology and system design. Equally interested in both hardware and software development, actively exploring various fields to broaden knowledge and skills. Experienced in working independently and collaboratively, with a high enthusiasm for learning new things and solving challenges creatively. Academic and industry experiences have provided a solid foundation in understanding real-world technological applications. Committed to lifelong learning, adaptability, and making meaningful contributions in every opportunity.
